short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The perfect NewTab featuring a clock, todo list, bookmarks and much more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A crisp NewTab with features like a clock, a to-do list, bookmarks and a search bar that help users stay focused and productive.

🕜 Stay organized and on schedule with our sleek and customizable clock feature. Whether you need to track time for work, study sessions, or personal tasks, our clock keeps you informed with precision and style.

📄 Never miss a beat with our intuitive to-do list feature. Easily jot down tasks, set deadlines, and prioritize your workload to stay productive and focused throughout the day. With customizable categories and reminders, managing your tasks has never been easier.

🌐 Keep your favorite websites at your fingertips with our convenient bookmarks feature. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and searching—simply save your go-to sites for quick access whenever you need them. 

🖼️ Personalize your browsing experience with our stunning collection of wallpapers. From breathtaking landscapes to abstract art, our curated selection offers something for every taste and mood. 

📝 Capture ideas, jot down reminders, and brainstorm with ease using our versatile notes feature. Whether you're planning your next project or simply need to make a quick list, our notes feature offers a streamlined solution for keeping your thoughts organized and accessible. 

🔍 Experience the greatness of our middle search box powered by Yahoo and Weather.
